definition: to restrict to even tone (i.e. final rhyming syllable must be classical first or second tone 平聲|平声)
to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
the final (of a syllable) (Chinese phonology)/rhyme/appeal/charm/(literary) pleasant sound
